sn35.72:1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
sn35.72:1.2: Avusitaṃ tena brahmacariyaṃ, ārakā so imasmā dhammavinayā”ti.
sn35.72:2.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.72:2.3: Ahañhi, bhante, channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāmī”ti.
sn35.72:3.2: cakkhuṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.72:5.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, cakkhu ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35.72:5.2: Evaṃ te etaṃ paṭhamaṃ phassāyatanaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati āyatiṃ apunabbhavāya …pe….
sn35.72:6.1: “Jivhaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.72:8.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, jivhā ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati. Evaṃ te etaṃ catutthaṃ phassāyatanaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati āyatiṃ apunabbhavāya …pe….
sn35.72:9.1: “Manaṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassasī”ti?
sn35.72:11.1: “Sādhu, bhikkhu, ettha ca te, bhikkhu, mano ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati.
sn35.72:11.2: Evaṃ te etaṃ chaṭṭhaṃ phassāyatanaṃ pahīnaṃ bhavissati āyatiṃ apunabbhavāyā”ti.
